headline: Coinbase, MicroStrategy Stocks Fall. Why It’s a Volatile Day for Crypto Shares.
summary: Coinbase Global Robinhood Markets  and other crypto-related stocks slipped early Tuesday as Bitcoin’s blistering rally appeared to take a pause.  Stocks exposed to cryptos had a volatile start to premarket trading and were fluctuating after the open.  Coinbase  the crypto exchange, fell 2%, while the trading platform  Robinhood Markets  rose 1.6%.

headline: Bitcoin touches record high above $93,000 on optimism around Trump's pro-crypto promises
summary: Bitcoin prices pushed to record highs on Wednesday, topping $93,000 and continuing the post-election surge for the world's largest cryptocurrency.

headline: As crypto fortunes swell, Robinhood announces tie-up with charity platform Daffy
summary: Daffy has facilitated the donation of over $25 million of crypto to charity.
